name: Bistecca della Vigilante!
desc: Amber's specialty. One side is obviously uncooked. The other side gives off a subtle scent of something burnt. Close your eyes and have a big mouthful, just to keep Amber happy if nothing else.

value.text: Revives a character and restores 10% of Max HP, then restores an additional 150 HP.

value.name: Ricetta: bistecca
value.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Steak.

value.name: Pezzo di carne cruda
value.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

value.name: Bistecca
value.desc: A grilled steak. High heat has locked the juices in, giving one high expectations for when the meat is cut open.

value.name: Amber
value.desc: Piena d'energia vitale, Amber è la migliore, nonché l'unica, Vigilante dei Cavalieri di Favonius
